customer_testimonials.testimonial: For security and scalability reasons, we decided right away that we wanted to entrust the delivery of our customers' videos to a reputable CDN provider. We settled on the infrastructure of Gcore and don't regret our choice.
customer_testimonials.author: Nathan Ihlenfeldt

customer_testimonials.testimonial: We managed to transfer all our resources without any problems. Our users did not notice any changes. Thanks to Gcore, we achieved the results we expected and saved over 40% on CDN infrastructure in a year.
customer_testimonials.author: David Salz

customer_testimonials.testimonial: I want to be able to quickly deliver content to my visitors, and Gcore does a great job of this.
customer_testimonials.author: Ethan Cheong

ddos_protection.name: DDoS Protection
ddos_protection.tagline: All-in-one real-time DDoS protection for websites, apps, and servers
ddos_protection.description: Global DDoS protection service with 200+ Tbps filtering capacity and 99.99% SLA. Protect against network, transport, and application layer attacks worldwide.
key_features: Block attacks from first request by sessions, not IPs
Low-frequency attack detection from first query

network_layer.title: Network-layer DDoS attacks (L3)
network_layer.description: Attacks that sap networks' bandwidth and disrupt target's interactions with partners and clients

transport_layer.title: Transport-layer DDoS attacks (L4)
transport_layer.description: Overload servers with large numbers of TCP packets (SYN/RST/ACK/PSH) to consume all available resources

application_layer.title: Application-layer DDoS attacks (L7)
application_layer.description: Interfere with or completely paralyze business applications, causing huge material and reputational losses

server_protection.title: Server protection
server_protection.description: Protecting servers against DDoS attacks at network (L3), transport (L4), and application (L7) layers in data centers worldwide

network_protection.title: Network Protection

filtering_platform.infrastructure: Global network of scrubbing centers worldwide

filtering_platform.guarantee: No delays and no performance degradation
filtering_platform.user_experience: Users won't notice web resource has been attacked

advanced_features.first_query_detection: Low-frequency attacks detection from the first query

compensation.description: SaaS projects must compensate customers for service unavailability

fintech.impact: Protect against attacks aimed at making services unavailable and stealing financial data

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Easy to calculate losses: entire revenue for attack duration. Every hour of inaccessibility costs your full hourly revenue
ecommerce.impact: Example: $50,000/hour store loses $50,000 for each hour of attack downtime

gaming.title: Gaming industry
gaming.description: ~80% of attacks target game servers. Failure risks losing reputation and customer loyalty forever

saas.title: SaaS companies
saas.description: DDoS attacks cause resource unavailability and require customer compensation for downtime

features: Protection against L3, L4, L7 attacks

features: Protection against L3, L4, L7 attacks

customer_success_stories.result: Successfully mitigated massive attacks with no player disruption, freed up 30% of engineering time

customer_success_stories.challenge: Infrastructure for 1.2+ billion users monthly requiring global DDoS protection
customer_success_stories.result: Reliable protection allowing focus on game development instead of attack mitigation

customer_success_stories.challenge: 253 Gbps UDP Flood attack targeting World of Tanks servers
customer_success_stories.result: Successfully repelled attack in 15 minutes with no service interruption

attack_mitigation_process.title: Automatic Detection
attack_mitigation_process.description: Attacks detected and traffic cleaned automatically in traffic validation mode within 1 minute

attack_mitigation_process.description: Advanced cleaning system receives, detects, and analyzes attack patterns

attack_mitigation_process.description: Comprehensive algorithms separate legitimate traffic from attacks, even sophisticated gaming traffic simulations

attack_mitigation_process.title: Clean Traffic Delivery
attack_mitigation_process.description: Only clean traffic arrives at servers via dedicated channel with no performance impact

cta_templates.ecommerce: Avoid revenue loss from DDoS downtime. Every hour of attack costs your full hourly revenue - protect with 1-minute detection and mitigation.
cta_templates.performance: Zero performance degradation guaranteed. Global scrubbing centers ensure users never notice attacks with proprietary filtering technology.
cta_templates.cost_effective: Starting at €3.9/month for enterprise-grade protection. Custom pricing available for large deployments with dedicated support.

Custom rule creation and policy management

comprehensive_protection.title: Comprehensive protection

dns.name: Managed DNS
dns.tagline: Enterprise-grade authoritative DNS delivering blazing-fast DNS resolution and mission-critical availability
dns.description: Global network of 210+ Anycast DNS servers providing fast application performance and 24/7 business continuity with comprehensive load balancing options.
key_features: DNS Health Checks with automatic failover

network_performance.title: Optimize your network performance
network_performance.description: Experience fast application performance with our global network of over 210 Anycast DNS servers. Wherever your users are in the world, we make sure they reach your service with minimal latency

business_continuity.title: Ensure your business continuity
business_continuity.description: Keep your services and applications available 24/7, without exception, with our robust, geo-distributed DNS infrastructure. We're committed to keeping your operations running smoothly

traffic_orchestration.title: Orchestrate traffic with ease
traffic_orchestration.description: Navigate even the most complex network challenges with ease, thanks to our comprehensive load balancing options. Direct traffic intelligently to pass on optimal performance and reliability to your customers

anycast_technology.title: Anycast DNS
anycast_technology.description: With Anycast, your queries are always routed to the nearest edge location, ensuring blazing-fast query response and resilient domain resolution even during massive traffic events like DDoS attacks
benefits: Queries routed to nearest edge location

advanced_load_balancing.title: More than GeoDNS
advanced_load_balancing.description: Take control of your traffic routing with advanced load balancing mechanisms. Wide range of rules and settings to accurately tailor traffic routing to specific needs

health_checks.title: DNS Health Checks
health_checks.description: Peace of mind with DNS Health Checks designed to keep applications running smoothly with high availability

devops_integration.title: DevOps-friendly DNS
devops_integration.description: Optimize your DevOps experience with extended API and configuration-as-code tools

technical_features.anycast_dns: Global Anycast network for optimal performance

high_traffic_domains.title: High-traffic domains
high_traffic_domains.description: Handle massive traffic volumes with resilient Anycast infrastructure and DDoS protection

global_applications.title: Global applications
global_applications.description: Route traffic intelligently across global regions with advanced GeoDNS and load balancing

mission_critical_services.title: Mission-critical services
mission_critical_services.description: Ensure 24/7 availability with Health Checks and automatic failover capabilities

devops_automation.title: DevOps automation
devops_automation.description: Integrate DNS management into CI/CD pipelines with Terraform, OctoDNS, and Kubernetes support

content_delivery.title: Content delivery optimization
content_delivery.description: Optimize content delivery with intelligent routing and minimal latency DNS resolution

disaster_recovery.title: Disaster recovery
disaster_recovery.description: Implement robust failover strategies with Health Checks and automatic DNS record updates

pricing.no_credit_card: No credit card required for free tier

competitive_advantages: Free tier with no credit card required
CNAME Flattening and HTTPS record support

reliability_features.ddos_resilience: Resilient domain resolution during DDoS attacks

cta_templates.performance: Achieve blazing-fast DNS resolution with 210+ Anycast servers globally. Route queries to nearest edge location for minimal latency worldwide.
cta_templates.reliability: Ensure mission-critical 24/7 availability with DDoS-protected infrastructure and automatic Health Check failover. Never experience DNS downtime.
cta_templates.enterprise: Enterprise-grade DNS with advanced load balancing, DNSSEC, and vanity name servers. Get custom pricing and dedicated support.
cta_templates.devops: DevOps-friendly DNS with Terraform, Kubernetes, and OctoDNS integrations. Automate DNS management in your CI/CD pipeline.
cta_templates.free_start: Start free with no credit card required. Scale from free tier to enterprise-grade DNS as your business grows.
cta_templates.advanced_routing: Go beyond GeoDNS with weighted balancing, subnet routing, and Health Checks. Intelligently orchestrate traffic for optimal performance.

fastedge.name: FastEdge
fastedge.tagline: Low-latency edge computing for serverless app deployment. Run code close to your users on Gcore's global network
fastedge.description: Serverless edge computing platform using WebAssembly runtime on 210+ global edge servers with 30ms average latency. Build highly responsive apps with zero server provisioning.
key_features: WebAssembly runtime on every edge server
JavaScript and Rust support (Go coming soon)

low_latency.title: Low latency everywhere
low_latency.description: FastEdge runs over a robust global network, with more than 210 data centers and outstanding connectivity. Gcore's average global latency is just 30 ms

fast_performance.title: Fast performance
fast_performance.description: FastEdge employs WebAssembly runtime, making it a great choice for performance-critical tasks and applications

cloud_ecosystem.title: Cloud ecosystem
cloud_ecosystem.description: Your FastEdge application works seamlessly with Gcore's cloud and network products including CDN, Virtual Machines, and S3 Storage

webassembly_technology.title: WebAssembly at the edge
webassembly_technology.description: We've deployed WebAssembly (Wasm) runtime on every edge server of our network. This keeps code execution close to your users for exceptional app responsiveness

language_support.title: Write in your language
language_support.description: Code in JavaScript and Rust. We're adding Go and other languages soon

cold_start.title: Cold start in microseconds
cold_start.description: Enjoy super-fast Wasm runtime, in several magnitudes faster than Linux container solutions

security.title: Secure environment
security.description: Run your app within the isolated sandbox, protected from malicious software

deployment.title: Quick deployment
deployment.description: Propagate your code to the edges in just a couple of minutes

operations.title: Zero server provisioning
operations.description: Develop, test, and run your apps—we've got the operations covered

pricing.title: Event-driven pricing
pricing.description: Pay only for the resources you use, not for idle capacity

ai_inference.title: AI inference
ai_inference.description: Run lightweight AI-models on edge servers from more than 210 locations worldwide. Build fast and responsive generative AI apps

image_editing.title: Advanced image editing
image_editing.description: Create your custom image editing logic to convert original images into the format your web design requires. Your image will be processed on the fly and served from the closest edge server

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: Deliver customized page content or notifications based on user preferences like location, device type, or sign-in status. Content will be served from the closest location without querying the origin server

ab_testing.title: A/B testing
ab_testing.description: Design and launch page tests by orchestrating your traffic at the edge. You can change the experiment settings quickly while maintaining a seamless experience for your end users

authentication.title: Quick authentication
authentication.description: Manage access to app content by validating secure tokens from the closest edge. This reduces the time taken for the end user to access the content, especially if you serve it from the CDN cache

custom_logic.title: Custom edge logic
custom_logic.description: Design and implement your custom logic at the edge by using header manipulation, rewrite, redirect, and orchestration of requests to backend endpoints

development_benefits.no_infrastructure: Focus on coding and creativity while FastEdge handles operations
development_benefits.responsive_apps: Build highly responsive apps with dynamically generated content
development_benefits.cost_efficiency: Pay only for actual resource usage
development_benefits.global_reach: Deploy once, run everywhere on global network

security_features.isolation: Isolated sandbox environment for each application

cta_templates.performance: Run code with 30ms average latency on 210+ edge servers worldwide. WebAssembly runtime delivers microsecond cold starts, magnitudes faster than containers.
cta_templates.serverless: Build serverless apps with zero infrastructure management. Deploy in minutes and pay only for actual usage with event-driven pricing.
cta_templates.ai_edge: Deploy AI inference at the edge across 210+ locations. Build fast, responsive generative AI apps with lightweight models running close to users.
cta_templates.personalization: Deliver real-time personalization without origin server queries. Customize content based on location, device, and user preferences at the edge.
cta_templates.developer: Code in JavaScript and Rust (Go coming soon) with zero server provisioning. Focus on creativity while FastEdge handles global deployment and operations.
cta_templates.integration: Seamlessly integrate with Gcore CDN, VMs, and S3 Storage. Implement custom logic with header manipulation, redirects, and backend orchestration.
